channel.title: NPC MaxHit and Npc Changing Combat Styles
channel.description: I want to make an npc be able to hit harder than 0's, and switch between magic and range attacks which can max, 50's and is very accurate, and also hits through prayer. Im using a deltascape source, any ideas?
